Package org.forgerock.openidm.script

Class ScriptedRequestHandler

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.script.ScriptedRequestHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler, org.forgerock.script.Scope
public class ScriptedRequestHandler extends Object implements org.forgerock.script.Scope, org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler
A ScriptedRequestHandler implements a RequestHandler using a script.
